com.rbmhtechnology.vind.api.query.facet

Class Facet.StatsNumericFacet<T extends Number>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rbmhtechnology.vind.api.query.facet.Facet
      • com.rbmhtechnology.vind.api.query.facet.Facet.StatsFacet<T>
        • com.rbmhtechnology.vind.api.query.facet.Facet.StatsNumericFacet<T>
  • Enclosing class:
    Facet

    public static class Facet.StatsNumericFacet<T extends Number>
extends Facet.StatsFacet<T>
    Allows to configure a numeric stats facet query. A stats facet query returns statistics calculated based on documents for an specific document field any type T. This class covers the specific statistics which can be perform on a numeric field.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.rbmhtechnology.vind.api.query.facet.Facet

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Facet.StatsNumericFacet<T> cardinality()
      Activate the cardinality statistics, which will give as result an statistical aproximation to the number of distinct values int he field.
      Facet.StatsNumericFacet<T> count()
      Activate the count statistics, which will give as result the count of documents with the specified field
      Facet.StatsNumericFacet<T> countDistinct()
      Activate the countDistinct statistics, which will give as result the count of distinct values for the specified field
      Facet.StatsNumericFacet<T> distinctValues()
      Activate the distinctValues statistics, which will give as result the set of distinct values for the specified field
      Facet.StatsNumericFacet<T> max()
      Activate the max statistics, which will give as result the maximum value for the specified field
      Facet.StatsNumericFacet<T> mean()
      Activate the mean statistics, which will give as result the average value for the specified field
      Facet.StatsNumericFacet<T> min()
      Activate the min statistics, which will give as result the minimum value for the specified field
      Facet.StatsNumericFacet<T> missing()
      Activate the missing statistics, which will give as result the number of elements without the specified field
      Facet.StatsNumericFacet<T> percentiles(Double... percentiles)
      Activate the percentiles statistics, which will give as result a set of percentile values for the selected field based on the points specified as parameters.
      Facet.StatsNumericFacet<T> setScope(Filter.Scope scope)
      Sets the field values Filter.Scope which this facet will use.
      Facet.StatsNumericFacet<T> stddev()
      Activate the stddev statistics, which will give as result the standard deviation for the specified field
      Facet.StatsNumericFacet<T> sum()
      Activate the sum statistics, which will give as result the addition of all values for the specified field
      Facet.StatsNumericFacet<T> sumOfSquares()
      Activate the sumOfSquares statistics, which will give as result the addition of all values squared for the specified field
